name: @soulofmischief/js-utils
description: A small, utilitarian JS library for personal use.
author: soulofmischief <soulofmischief@protonmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean --scripts-prepend-node-path; for script in {flow,lib}; do npm run build:$script --scripts-prepend-node-path; done
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && cp -f package.json lib && npm version patch && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && cp -f package.json lib && npm version minor && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && cp -f package.json lib && npm version major && npm publish --access public lib
